title: Hidan no Aria AA - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Ecchi   Martial Arts   School Life
author: Akamatsu Chuugaku   Team Amica
description: Akari Mamiya is an Rank E freshman who looks up to her senior, the S-ranked Aria H. Kanzaki. They both attend Tokyo Butei High School, a school that trains its students as Armed Detectives otherwise known as 'Butei' to society. Individual student training aside, the school employs the co-operative 'Amica' system, allowing an underclassman to train alongside an upperclassman. Akari is determined to be paired with Aria. >
